structure.unit: AGRICULTURAL SEEDS, FEEDING STUFFS, AND FERTILIZERS

law.text: Any person violating any of the provisions of KRS 250.650 to 250.720 shall upon conviction thereof be guilty of a misdemeanor. Each separate violation of KRS 250.650 to 250.720 shall constitute a separate offense and be punishable by a fine of not less than fifty dollars ($50) nor more than three hundred dollars ($300) or by imprisonment in jail for ninety (90) days, or both.
law.history: Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 9, effective June 16, 1960.
